H0.text: What is the ninth month of the Muslim year, a period of fasting during which there is strict abstinence during daylight from food, drink and perfume. Shawwal

H1.text: What is the ninth month of the Muslim year, a period of fasting during which there is strict abstinence during daylight from food, drink and perfume. Dhul Hijjah

H2.text: What is the ninth month of the Muslim year, a period of fasting during which there is strict abstinence during daylight from food, drink and perfume. Muharram

H3.text: What is the ninth month of the Muslim year, a period of fasting during which there is strict abstinence during daylight from food, drink and perfume. رمضان

A4.text: Ramadan is the ninth month of the Islamic calendar.

A5.text: The annual observance of Ramadan is regarded as one of the five pillars of Islam and lasts twenty-nine to thirty days, from one sighting of the crescent moon to the next.
